creation.inputPlaceholder: Describe what you want to create...

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base

editor.emptyDesc: Choose a file from the explorer to view or edit its content.

knowledge.graphDesc: Visualize the connections between your notes.
knowledge.graphEmpty: No notes or links to display. Start writing and linking notes with [[WikiLinks]] to build your graph.

general.title: General
general.shortcutsDesc: These shortcuts work even when the app is not focused.
general.shortcutPlaceholder: Click and press a key combination

apiKeys.title: API & Models
apiKeys.description: Manage API providers and assign models to different tasks.
apiKeys.noProviders: No API providers configured. Add one to get started.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Manage directories that Nexus will index and learn from.
knowledge.noFolders: No folders have been added to the knowledge base yet.

scripts.title: Actions & Integrations
scripts.description: Configure custom actions, scripts, and integrations with external services.
scripts.scriptDirsDesc: Nexus will discover executable scripts in these folders to use as tools.

execution.title: Execution Environment
execution.description: Configure how and where Nexus executes code and runs its backend.
execution.pythonPathDesc: Leave blank to use 'python' from your system's PATH.
execution.workingDirDesc: The default directory where scripts will be executed.
execution.autoStart: Start backend automatically on app launch

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Export all your data for backup, or import data to restore.
backup.exportDesc: This will create a single JSON file containing all your conversations, settings, and knowledge base index.
backup.restoreDesc: This will overwrite all current data in the application with the data from the backup file. This action cannot be undone.
backup.restoreSuccess: Data restored successfully! Please restart the application.
backup.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore from this backup? All current data will be permanently overwritten.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect Nexus to external services and applications.
integrations.noIntegrations: No integrations have been configured yet.

tools.title: Tools
tools.notFound: No tools found matching your search.

clipboard.title: Clipboard History
clipboard.emptyDesc: Content you copy will appear here.

storage.warningText: Usage is high. Consider cleaning up.
storage.criticalText: Usage is critical. Please clean up data.
